note.p: Born 6 October 1794 at Little Casterton, Rutland. Educated at Rugby School and St. Johns College, Cambridge. Matriculated Michaelmas term 1812 and graduated in 1816 BA, 8th Wrangler. Fellow of St. Johns 1817-30, Chaplain of Horningsea 1826-29. Moved to Oxfordshire in 1829 to become Vicar of North Stoke with Ipsden, and died there in 1871.
